  • Uses of Reservation in Controller

    Methods in Controller that return Reservation
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Reservation
    ReservationController.createReservation()
    Create a new object of Reservation by asking several essential inputs for constructing.
    static Reservation
    ReservationController.getReservation(int index)
    Gets the reservation which is stored in reservationList according to its index
    static Reservation
    ReservationController.returnEarliestCheckInReservationByRoomType(Room.RoomType rt)
    Search through the reservationList to get the reservation which is in WAITLIST and has the same room type as the argument, and also the earliest check-in date.
    static Reservation
    ReservationController.searchReservationByCode(String st)
    Search through the reservationList and get the reservation which has the same reservationCode as the given String st
    static Reservation
    ReservationController.searchReservationByIC()
    Ask for and read the input for IC number from the user.
    static Reservation
    ReservationController.searchReservationSelection()
    Allows selection of search method: searchReservationByCode and searchReservationByIC .

    Method
    Description
    static void
    ReservationController.addReservation(Reservation r)
    add an object of Reservation into the reservationList
    static void
    CheckInController.checkIn(Reservation r)
    This is the check in method, it checks in the guest if they have a reservation and the reservation status have to be confirmed.
    static boolean
    CheckInController.checkInValidator(Reservation r)
    This checks if the guest with the reservation is able to check in a not.
    static void
    CheckOutController.checkOut(Reservation r)
    This is the check out method, it checks out the guest as well as the accompanying guest staying in the same room.
    static void
    CheckOutController.checkOutPrintCreditCardDetails(Reservation r)
    This method prints the details of the credit card that the guest provided.
    static boolean
    CheckOutController.checkOutValidator(Reservation r)
    This checks if the guest with the reservation is able to check out a not.
    static double
    CheckOutController.getTotalBill(Reservation r)
    This method gets the total bill of the room that the guest is staying.
    static void
    ReservationController.printPartReservation(Reservation r)
    Prints the Guest's Name and Passport/IC number and Contact number of a target reservation.
    static void
    ReservationController.printReservation(Reservation r)
    Prints a particular reservation details (all attributes from Reservation)
    static void
    ReservationController.removeReservation(Reservation r)
    Removal of reservation at the same time update the room status of this Reservation's room if the this reservation has checked in or confirmed.
    static void
    ReservationController.updateDateIn(Reservation r, LocalDate dateIn)
    Changes the check-in date of the given reservation r by given new check-in date dateIn.
    static void
    ReservationController.updateDateOut(Reservation r, LocalDate dateOut)
    Changes the check-out date of the given reservation r by given new check-out date dateOut.
    static void
    ReservationController.updateNumOfAdults(Reservation r, int num)
    Changes the number of adults declared in the reservation r.
    static void
    ReservationController.updateNumOfChildren(Reservation r, int num)
    Changes the number of children declared in the reservation r.
    static void
    ReservationController.updateReservation(Reservation r)
    Display the selection page, allowing user to choose the attribute of the reservation r in order to be changed.
